title: Grateful Dead Live at Philadelphia Civic Center on 1984-04-21
source: Matrix 2 Source Mix - SBD (shnid=137247)  Recording Info: SBD > Cassette Master > Reel > Dat (Panasonic SV-3800/48k); Transfer Info: Dat (Sony R500) > Tascam DA-3000 > Adobe Audition CC 2015 > Samplitude Pro X3 Suite > FLAC/48k; All Transfers and Mastering By Charlie Miller + AUD (shn id 10035) Recorded by Rob Eaton and Jeff Silberman -- Rob's Neumann u87 (cardiod setting, split 30', 17th row) > 6 x 9 volts > Teac mic transformers -> Jeff's Technics SV-100 line in @ 14 bits > DAT > CDR > EAC > SHN; see info file for additional notes - matrix mixing by Kevin Tobin
